law.text: Nothing contained in KRS 162.170 or 162.180 is intended to or shall be construed to make interest rates applicable to revenue bonds issued by the governing bodies of state institutions of higher learning under KRS 162.340 to 162.380, inclusive, subject to regulation, establishment, limitation, or approval by the Kentucky Board of Education.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 362, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1996. -- Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 560, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 82, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 3.
